item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Observer's Seat Inoperative – Inertial Escape Reels

numlitem.para: One inertial escape reel is available for each crewmember/observer, and
Inoperative escape reel(s) is removed from installed location.
Operations are limited to not more than two flight days before repair is made.
Occupants are limited to the number of operative escape devices.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "# ESCAPE REEL(S) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Utilize AMM 25-61-02-2 procedures to remove the inoperative Inertial Escape Reel(s).
Utilize AMM 25-61-02-2 procedures to reinstall the operative Inertial Escape Reel(s).
Place inoperative Inertial Escape Reel(s) in forward cargo bin or remove from aircraft.
Place inoperative Escape Harness(es) in forward cargo bin or remove from aircraft.
Notify dispatch that escape device(s) are inoperative per MEL and that the number of people on the aircraft is limited to the number of operative escape devices.
